basics.name: Ilya Medvedev
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full-Stack Developer with expertise in the MERN stack. Proficient across a wide range of modern web technologies including TypeScript, React, SvelteKit, Next.js, Vue.js, Node.js, and SQL/NoSQL databases, I leverage a strong aesthetic sensibility derived from my fine arts background to build intuitive and visually compelling web applications. I have a proven ability to deliver tangible business outcomes, including boosting user-friendliness by 15% and client clarity by 30% for a Swiss-based music application.

work.name: Hieroglyph Code - Custom Software Solutions
highlights: Full-Stack Architecture: Engineered a RESTful API with Node.js and Express.js to handle all content, including dynamic image assets fetched from an external server, creating a highly efficient front-end.
Key Components: Developed from scratch: Product Card, Interactive Gallery, Product Carousel, Navbar, Language Switcher, Search Functionality, Preloader and other components.
Design & UX: Utilized Figma to collaborate on and implement the front-end design, ensuring a professional and user-friendly interface.

End-to-End Quality Assurance: Implemented a dedicated test suite using Cypress to establish reliable End-to-End (E2E) testing for core user journeys, ensuring site integrity and preventing regressions across major components.
Workflow: Implemented a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions for automated deployments.

work.name: Loctoc PTE. LTD
highlights: Boosted user-friendliness by 15% and client clarity by 30% by actively developing frontend components for a Swiss-based music application using Svelte and SvelteKit.
Integrated payment services via Stripe and optimized content delivery with BunnyNet CDN.
Collaborated within a comprehensive development ecosystem involving Golang, Postgres DB, Docker, Heroku, and GitLab.

education.institution: Open University: INT college â€“ Institute of Innovation & Technology

education.area: Bachelor of Education, Certified Senior Teacher in subject of Art

projects.name: Mindconnect.ai - AI Chatbot
projects.description: Full Stack Developer Intern | Basel, Switzerland (Private Enterprise Project)
highlights: Engineered and implemented a user authentication system from the ground up, including responsive sign-in components, using Ant Design, Vue.js 3, and TypeScript to enable secure user login via Google Sign-in.
Built an AI chat component from scratch, focusing on an intuitive and responsive UI with TypeScript, Vue.js 3, and SASS.
Collaborated with backend developer to integrate frontend components, ensuring seamless data flow.

projects.name: FreeDi - AI-Powered Group Decision Platform
highlights: Designed and implemented an API function utilizing Google Generate AI, demonstrating direct experience integrating AI into web functionalities.
Successfully built Login and User components from scratch using Next.js, Redux.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and Firebase.
Resolved critical SASS and global app design issues, improving user engagement by 20% and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
To address low user engagement, I developed a responsive Popup Notification component using Figma, TypeScript, React, and SASS, which increased user engagement by 10%.

projects.name: Daniela Hagmann - Mobile Psychological Therapy Services Website (Client Project)
highlights: Core Stack: Engineered with a Node.js backend and a Vanilla JavaScript front-end, with styling handled by SASS and CSS for optimal performance.
Full-Lifecycle Management: Handled the entire project lifecycle, including domain registration, DNS management, and SSL/TLS configuration, with final deployment to Firebase.
Key Features: Developed dynamic elements including Mobile Navbar and a Testimonials component.
Analytics & Compliance: Integrated Google Analytics and ensured compliance with official Swiss medical health standards.
